text:
There isn't enough information for me to identify the root cause of the 
problem you are experiencing.

My best guess is an error in your jsp rather than a Tomcat bug. I suggest you 
follow this up on the tomcat-user list.

If you are certain the error is with Tomcat, it would help enormously if you 
attached the simplest form of the jsp that recreates the error so it can be 
used as a test case.
creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
